thread.title: Rocket Fuel reports 2Q loss

title: Rocket Fuel reports 2Q loss
text:
Rocket Fuel reports 2Q loss Rocket Fuel reports 2nd-quarter loss but tops expectations 1 hour ago Content preferences Done 
REDWOOD CITY, Calif. (AP) _ Rocket Fuel Inc. (FUEL) on Wednesday reported a loss of $24.4 million in its second quarter. 
On a per-share basis, the Redwood City, California-based company said it had a loss of 58 cents. Losses, adjusted for restructuring costs and stock option expense, were 17 cents per share. 
The results beat Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of three analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for a loss of 50 cents per share. 
The advertising technology company posted revenue of $120.1 million in the period. 
Rocket Fuel shares have fallen 55 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $7.26, a decrease of 71 percent in the last 12 months.
